description.value:
30cm obsidian cylinders, causes all psykers within 2d10 metres to take all tests to use psychic powers at -30. When on the user's person, they provide +30 to resist any psychic powers that directly affect them. Can be used as a Power Weapon to hit people (use Power Sword Profile without Balanced Quality)

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
